resources.string: unable to interact with stacked-cups since initialisation failed
This is a simple code exercise on solving the stacked cups problem as described in the source repository at https://github.com/DavidArayan/stacked-cups
Use the form below to add volume in ml to the stacked cups hierarchy. Use the Query functionality to check the amount of volume contained in each cup. Each cup contains 250ml volume capacity.
The provided cup coordinates are not within valid query ranges
Use the form below to check the amount of contained liquid in each individual cup
